item.title: Fewer Americans sign up for Affordable Care Act health insurance as costs spike
item.description: Fewer Americans are signing up for Affordable Care Act health insurance plans this year

item.title: EPA says it will stop calculating the economic savings to health in key air pollution rules
item.description: The Environmental Protection Agency says it will stop calculating the economic savings of health benefits from air pollution rules

item.title: David Webb, prominent Hong Kong shareholder activist, dies at 60
item.description: David Webb, a prominent Hong Kong shareholder activist, has died at 60

item.title: Bargain grocer Aldi seizes the moment and expands with consumers hurting
item.description: The discount grocery chain Aldi is expanding rapidly and plans to open more than 180 U.S. stores this year as more Americans skip nights out at restau...

item.title: Uganda's military deployed in national capital before presidential election
item.description: Uganda President Yoweri Museveni and his opponents have held their final rallies before the country's next election
